questions: How Should I Respond If I Am Summoned as a Juror But No Longer Reside in NJ?
If I moved out of the state who do I notify about my jury summons?
I received a jury summons but have recently moved out of state what do I do?
answers: If you no longer reside in New Jersey, it is important that you respond by completing the Juror . Questionnaire through the Juror eResponse Portal where you will be asked question about your residency. To access the portal click here
